history.text: Hello!
Hiya!
I have a quick question. Do you like action movies?
Yes, I do.
Well, then I have a treat for you! I would recommend the film John Wick. It's the best action movie out there and it's 4 years old.
What is it about?
The story follows a man named John Wick, which is played by Keanu Reeves who is an ex hitman that is trying to live a normal life after his wife dies.
It sounds interesting!
It's actually pretty good story wise. I really don't want to spoil it for you. I think its a refreshing for the guys because there isn't any of the fluff you see in other movies.
It not your basic shoot everyone kind of film, every action has a purpose and I think thats is what I enjoy the most.
If you like Keanu Reeves you'll love him in this film
Ahh, yes. I prefer a solid story as well.
Does it have a happy ending?
That's a good question. In my opinion yes but it leaves a "To be continued" kind of vibe to it if you know what I mean.
I do. How did his wife die?
It's never explained in the film which is strange, they sort of elude to an illness but its not confirmed ever.
They focus on the things the wife leaves behind for him to heal from her passing
What is his involvement with people he is going after?
Well his wife arranged for him to have a puppy delivered to his home after she dies. Wick also has a favorite car and a russian thug breaks into his home and kills the dog and steals the car.
So he goes after them? That's bold. He is special or just ordinary? For example, does he has special fighting skills?

He is actually feared by everyone in the film because of the things that he's done. The person he's going after happens to be the son of a big Russian mob boss. His father is scared to death of Wick, because he gave John an impossible task and completed it with no problems.
He commented to his son that they call John "Baba Yaga", which means boogeyman in Russian.
Did the Russians know who he was or did they just pick a random car to steal?
The son had no idea who John was. He thought he was just some random guy.
When his dad finds out he beats his son up and explains just how serious of a problem he caused.
That sounds interesting. Does it have a lot of CGI?
It has absolutely ZERO CGI which is a major plus and I think that's why a lot of action movie lovers like it too.
I think that makes for a better action movie. It relies on the story and the stunt men!
Every scene is realistic and shot in one sequence. When an action scene starts, there is never any cutting to another angle.
No magically reloaded guns, no close up shots,etc.
It sounds like a good quality action movie. I'm always annoyed by magical guns with unlimited ammo.

I feel it takes away from the movie because I get stuck on the lack of plausibility
.
When did you say it came out again?
Exactly, I think the director did a good job on it in my opinion.
The movie came out in 2014 with good scores on rotten tomatoes.

Awesome. I will have to check
 it out. Thank you!
No problem I guarantee you'll enjoy it
have a good day!
You too!

uid2response.feedback: I didn't have the document but the other user who did was excellent at giving useful information!
